memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T dt, T *cf, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv)
memberdef.name: bottomfrictionGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel for applying bottom friction to all active blocks.

detaileddescription.para: Updates velocity components using the specified friction model (default, smart, or Manning) for each cell in all blocks.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T dt, T *cf, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv)
memberdef.name: bottomfrictionCPU

briefdescription.para: CPU routine for applying bottom friction to all active blocks.

detaileddescription.para: Updates velocity components using the specified friction model (default, smart, or Manning) for each cell in all blocks.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T dt, T *cf, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv_o)
memberdef.name: XiafrictionCPU

briefdescription.para: CPU routine for applying bottom friction following Xia & Lang (2018).

detaileddescription.para: Updates velocity components using the Xia & Lang friction model for each cell in all blocks, using both current and previous evolving variables. Reference: Xia and Lang (2018), https://doi.org/10.1016/j.advwatres.2018.05.004

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T dt, T *cf, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv_o)
memberdef.name: XiafrictionGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel for applying Xia & Lang (2018) bottom friction to all active blocks.

detaileddescription.para: Updates velocity components using the Xia & Lang friction model for each cell in all blocks, using both current and previous evolving variables.

briefdescription.para: Smart friction model for roughness height.

detaileddescription.para: Computes friction coefficient using a log-law based on water depth and roughness height.
Computes friction coefficient using Manning's equation based on gravity, water depth, and Manning's n.

briefdescription.para: Function Used to prevent crazy velocity.

detaileddescription.para: The function scale velocities so it doesn't exceeds a given threshold. Default threshold is/should be 16.0m/s

simplesect.para: true if velocity was above threshold and has been scaled down, false otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv)
memberdef.name: TheresholdVelGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel for enforcing a velocity threshold. Function Used to prevent crazy velocity on the GPU. The function wraps the main function for the GPU. Updates velocity components to ensure they do not exceed a specified threshold.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv)
memberdef.name: TheresholdVelCPU

briefdescription.para: CPU routine for enforcing a velocity threshold.

detaileddescription.para: Updates velocity components to ensure they do not exceed a specified threshold. Function Used to prevent crazy velocity on the CPU
